Text.Value: Be my guest. But don't get too close, or your eyes'll melt shut.
I'd worry about surviving the night first. But help one, help both: if we can cool you off, it'll stabilise your engine and allow you to touch whomever you please.
A little gift from Zariel. Keeps me burning hot.

EditorData.NodeContext: "A little gift from Zariel" is with a bit of bile in your voice, though Karlach keeps things light. Lightly pounds chest with fist to indicate where the machine is.
EditorData.SFXTags: [EG] Karlach knocking her knuckles on engine in chest

Text.Value: Elturel - your city was swallowed up by Avernus, right?
I've sensed some during our travels. It has a pull to it - absolutely magnetic, once you know what you're looking for. I can show you where I'd look.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: This will be handled in the map/ journal UI, no need for any anims here.

Text.Value: I have some infernal iron right here. Take it.
Will you be able to turn down the temperature a little? Worried I'm gonna go in for a handshake and singe someone's arm off one of these days.
I'm not sure. Should we be tampering with an infernal machine?
I got lucky. It looks like you did too. And... you brought some infernal machinery with you.

EditorData.NodeContext: Sniffing once or twice, he smells Karlach's infernal war machine heart

Text.Value: I thought they had you for keeps. Glad you got out.
You might be right. But... I'm running really hot. Might be nice if we could calm things down a little?
And, if you don't mind me saying, it seems they got to you too. There's infernal machinery inside you, right? Very, very hot infernal machinery.
|DEBUG donate UI test.|
I might be able to help, but I'd need infernal iron. And a prayer that my hammer'll survive the work.
I don't think so.
Hm - looks like it went missing. I'll be here if you find it.
Will you be able to turn down the temperature a little? Worried I'm gonna go in for a handshake and singe someone's arm off one of these days.
Meanwhile, I've still got plenty of weapons and armour in stock if you're looking to load up.
Hey soldier - I think we picked up some of that infernal iron already. What say you - should I give it to him?

EditorData.NodeContext: Intonation: "Hey soldier" is calling for the player's attention, like "you there".

Text.Value: Absolutely - let's see what he can do.
Sounds familiar. When our city fell into Avernus, Zariel's commanders put me to work in their forges.
Where should I look for infernal iron?
Vicious bastards, the lot of them, but it helped that they thought I had some utility.
Very hot, by the smell of it. Might be burning out a piston ring - or leaking oil. Mind if I take a listen?

EditorData.NodeContext: Sniffing once or twice, he smells Karlach's infernal war machine heart

Text.Value: Thanks, mate. You'll be seeing me again soon.
Leave.
Never mind my story. You sensed an infernal?
The devils were delighted when your city was swallowed up. I thought they had you for keeps. Glad you got out.
Phew! You really are burning up. Whoever put that engine together tried to house metallurgised demono-valves inside a ra-gnax alloy casement. Very risky.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Choices]*REUSE*[Dammon][Karlach] share same custom anim with scene, GLO_ForgingOfTheHeart_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Dammon approaches Karlach and leans his ear toward her chest, trying to listen to her heart. We hear its fire burning, cogs grinding, etc. After a moment, Dammon jerks away, feeling the heat of her.
EditorData.NodeContext: Ra-gnax: RAG-nax. metallurgised = i'm not sure how it's said in UK, i'd say 'metta-lur-gized' with roughly same emphasis on all syllables. demono-valves = de-MON-o-valves (nothing special here, just demonic valves).
EditorData.SFXTags: [EG] Karlach heart engine pumping, fire burning sounds, dogs grinding. Sizzle of Dammon's ear
EditorData.VFXTags: [EG] Slight smoke off Dammons face as he gets burnt by Karlachs body

Text.Value: That thing isn't meant to operate outside Avernus. I'm not sure how much longer it'll keep running, the way it's going.
Phew! You really are burning up. Whoever put that engine together tried to house metallurgised demono-valves inside a ra-gnax alloy casement. Very risky.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Choices]*REUSE*[Dammon][Karlach] share same custom anim with scene, GLO_ForgingOfTheHeart_OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_COM

EditorData.NodeContext: Ra-gnax: RAG-nax. metallurgised = i'm not sure how it's said in UK, i'd say 'metta-lur-gized' with roughly same emphasis on all syllables. demono-valves = de-MON-o-valves (nothing special here, just demonic valves).
EditorData.SFXTags: [EG] Karlach heart engine pumping, fire burning sounds, dogs grinding. Sizzle of Dammon's ear
EditorData.VFXTags: [EG] Slight smoke off Dammons face as he gets burnt by Karlachs body

Text.Value: I'd worry about surviving the night first. But help one, help both: if we can cool you off, it'll stabilise your engine and allow you to touch whomever you please.
There you are. The infernal. I knew there must be one in the area. If we survive this, let's speak again. I'm a mechanic - we might be of use to one another.
Do you know what you're doing?
We'll keep our eyes open for some iron.
Didn't mean to overstep. Keep an eye on that thing, though. I don't like what I'm smelling - for your sake, that is.
Not much to a regular smith, but a fair bit to a canny buyer.
Will you be able to turn down the temperature a little? I haven't touched anyone in a long time.
Thought I sensed an infernal around here. But you aren't from Elturel. What's your story?

EditorData.NodeContext: Smelling the air, he can smell the infernal machinery on Karlach.

Text.Value: Mind if I listen closer?
I only recently escaped the Hells. I was enlisted against my will by the archdevil Zariel.
They must've thought the same of you. That's infernal machinery I smell, isn't it? And running awfully hot. Might be burning out a piston ring - or leaking oil.
Hey, I remember you. The weaponsmith, right? Your city was swallowed up by Avernus. And you were enlisted against your will, like my good self.
Not that that matters. We want to use it, not sell it.
Thought I sensed an infernal around here. But you aren't from Elturel. What's your story?
I got lucky. It looks like you did too. And... you brought some infernal machinery with you.

EditorData.NodeContext: Sniffing once or twice, he smells Karlach's infernal war machine heart

Text.Value: Be my guest. But don't get too close, or your eyes'll melt shut.
Could we see your wares?
Can I see your wares?
I'll take whatever it is you're offering.
Hm - looks like it went missing. I'll be here if you find it.
Forged from the heart.
I think I picked up some of that infernal iron already. Can we at least see what you can do?
Infernal machinery, anyway. Smells like it's running awfully hot. Might be burning out a piston ring - or leaking oil.
Very hot, by the smell of it. Might be burning out a piston ring - or leaking oil. Mind if I take a listen?

EditorData.NodeContext: Sniffing once or twice, he smells Karlach's infernal war machine heart

Text.Value: Meanwhile, I've still got plenty of weapons and armour in stock if you're looking to load up.
And the closer you get, the stronger it smells.
I've sensed some during our travels. It has a pull to it - absolutely magnetic, once you know what you're looking for. I can show you where I'd look.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: This will be handled in the map/ journal UI, no need for any anims here.

Text.Value: I've sensed some during our travels. It has a pull to it - absolutely magnetic, once you know what you're looking for. I can show you where I'd look.
Personally, I'd like to know what infernal iron is worth.
I'll see what I can do to give you more time if you find some infernal iron, but a machine that complicated is going to need serious work - more than a pauper's forge can handle.
Thanks a lot. I'll be back when I find that infernal iron.
Leave.
Be my guest. But don't get too close, or your eyes'll melt shut.
Hm - looks like it went missing. I'll be here if you find it.
I'd worry about yourself first. That thing isn't meant to operate outside Avernus. I'm not sure how much longer it'll keep running, the way it's going.
Forged from the heart.
Thought I sensed an infernal around here. But you aren't from Elturel. What's your story?
A little gift from Zariel. Keeps me burning hot.

EditorData.NodeContext: "A little gift from Zariel" is with a bit of bile in your voice, though Karlach keeps things light. Lightly pounds chest with fist to indicate where the machine is.
EditorData.SFXTags: [EG] Hand tapping metal infernal engine on chest

Text.Value: It didn't take 'em long to notice I had some utility and stick me in the forges.
I might be able to help, but I'd need infernal iron. And a prayer that my hammer'll survive the work.
I like to think so. Especially when I smell machinery running itself out like a miniature giant space hamster on a cosmic wheel.
I spent a good bit of time in the Hells. Enlisted against my will by the archdevil Zariel. Same as you, I suppose, if you're from Elturel.
That thing isn't meant to operate outside Avernus. I'm not sure how much longer it'll keep running, the way it's going.
Where should we look for infernal iron?
Looking forward to it. It's been a while since I was able to work with anything from the Hells. I won't say I miss it, but... well, maybe I do.

Synopsis: Dammon sees Karlach and feels her infernal engine. Him having been a weaponsmith in hell knows how to upgrade it and offers his services if the party brings him some infernal metal.
